00030 class COREDLL Timer {

00032         // Public Timer Methods
00033         Timer();
00034         ~Timer();
00035         
00036         void Start();
00037         void Stop();

00039         
00040         double Time();
00041 private:
00042         // Private Timer Data
00043         double time0, elapsed;
00044         bool running;
00045         double GetTime();

00048         int fd;
00049         unsigned long long counter64;
00050         unsigned int counter32;
00051         unsigned int cycleval;
00052         
00053         typedef unsigned long long iotimer64_t;
00054         typedef unsigned int iotimer32_t;
00055         volatile iotimer64_t *iotimer_addr64;
00056         volatile iotimer32_t *iotimer_addr32;
00057         
00058         void *unmapLocation;
00059         int unmapSize;
00060 #elif defined( WIN32 )
00061         // Private Windows Timer Data
00062         LARGE_INTEGER performance_counter, performance_frequency;

00064 #else
00065         // Private UNIX Timer Data
00066         struct timeval timeofday;
00067 #endif
